SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS OCR_DTM ,DATE_FORMAT(b.CLOSE_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CLOSE_DTM ,a.INCDNT_TYPE ,b.INCDNT_RES_TYPE ,b.PROG_DIV ,a.VHC_NO ,DATE_FORMAT(a.UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTM ,a.REMARK ,a.INCDNT_DETAIL ,c.LINK_NM FROM BRT_INCDNT_HIS a LEFT JOIN BRT_INCDNT_RES_INFO b ON a.OPER_DT = b.OPER_DT AND a.VHC_ID = b.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_LINK_MST c ON a.LINK_ID = c.LINK_ID
AND a.INCDNT_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || b.PROG_DIV LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.INCDNT_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND b.PROG_DIV LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.OCR_DTM >= #{CLCT_DT}
AND b.CLOSE_DTM <= #{CLOSE_DT}
AND a.OCR_DTM between DATE_FORMAT(#{CLCT_DT}, '%Y-%m-%d 0:0:0') and DATE_FORMAT(#{CLOSE_DT}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:00') AND b.CLOSE_DTM between DATE_FORMAT(#{CLCT_DT}, '%Y-%m-%d 0:0:0') and DATE_FORMAT(#{CLOSE_DT}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:00')
ORDER BY OCR_DTM DESC
